poem:
### High Street Elegy

In Montserrat's embrace, where paths betray  
the foot's firm trust, he found the edge  
of life's last collection. Stitched threads  
of opulence, unraveled in a single slip,  
whispered farewells through tangled vines,  
the silent echo of a fashioning hand  
now still, like the final hem sewn  
against the mountainside's eternal seam.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. According to media reports, Andic, who was 71, died after slipping and falling 100 metres down a ravine while hiking in the Montserrat caves near Barcelona with several family members. Mango confirmed his death in a statement". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
